message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I believe it's a great opportunity for both of us to come to a mutually beneficial agreement. My initial offer is $900000.

Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate you coming down to $900000.  I'm really interested in this product, but I'm going to need to see a lower price to make this work.  I'm willing to pay $850000 for it.

Thanks for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand you're trying to get the best deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $850000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll counter with $875000. This is my best price for now.
